name: Beeminder
natural_language_description: 这是 Beeminder 节点。主要用于: Consume Beeminder API

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: apiToken

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: datapoint | (必填项)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get | (必填项)

goalName.name: goalName
goalName.description: The name of the goal. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
goalName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Goal Name or ID | 作用: The name of the goal. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

amount.name: amount
amount.natural_language_description: 参数名: Amount | 作用: Charge amount in USD | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

datapoints.name: datapoints
datapoints.description: Array of datapoint objects to create. Each object should contain value and optionally timestamp, comment, etc.
datapoints.natural_language_description: 参数名: Datapoints | 作用: Array of datapoint objects to create. Each object should contain value and optionally timestamp, comment, etc. | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

slug.name: slug
slug.natural_language_description: 参数名: Goal Slug | 作用: Unique identifier for the goal | (必填项)

title.name: title
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Goal Title | 作用: Human-readable title for the goal | (必填项)

goal_type.name: goal_type
goal_type.description: Type of goal. More info here..
goal_type.natural_language_description: 参数名: Goal Type | 作用: Type of goal. More info here.. | 默认值: hustler | (必填项)

gunits.name: gunits
gunits.natural_language_description: 参数名: Goal Units | 作用: Units for the goal (e.g., "hours", "pages", "pounds") | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 30

value.name: value
value.natural_language_description: 参数名: Value | 作用: Datapoint value to send | 默认值: 1 | (必填项)

datapointId.name: datapointId
datapointId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Datapoint ID | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: emaciated (值: None) - Whether to include the goal attributes called road, roadall, and fullroad will be stripped from the goal objects

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: value (值: None) - Datapoint value to send
timestamp (值: None) - Defaults to "now" if none is passed in, or the existing timestamp if the datapoint is being updated rather than created

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: sort (值: None) - Attribute to sort on
page (值: None) - Used to paginate results, 1-indexed, meaning page 1 is the first page
per (值: None) - Number of results per page. Default 25. Ignored without page parameter. Must be non-negative
